answers.answer: Some of the symptoms could very well be menopause, but hair loss and aches and pains could be due to dietary insufficiency.  Are you getting enough zinc in your diet? are you eating enough of various different foods? I would get yourself checked out by your doctor who could give you a more thorough analysis of your problems.

Anyone reading this and feeling bad with these symptoms take a look at the journal ,ginger, shes the cl of the dog forum, has up now,there is a link you may be interested in looking at ...may give us all some insight why so many are feeling sick .

question: Lately I can go from being comfortable to being hot to being cold with no outward influences. The changes can happen in a matter of seconds. I am also having itching, vaginal dryness, hair loss, muscle aches and pains. I had a partial hysterectomy 15 years ago but they didn't take my ovaries. I am now 57. From what I've read this sounds like menopause, but is their anything to keep the symptoms down. They are horrible. How do women deal with this. I can be sitting in my chair and go from cold to hot (sweating) in seconds.
